Package primitives

Class Ray

java.lang.Object
primitives.Ray
public class Ray
extends java.lang.Object
set of points on line

  • Constructor Details

    • Ray

      public Ray​(Point3D start, Vector direction)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      start - the beginning of the Ray
      direction - the direction of the Ray

    • Ray

      public Ray​(Ray other)
      Copy constructor
      Parameters:
      other - item to copy

    • Ray

      public Ray​(Point3D originP, Vector direction, Vector normal)
      Because there is need to move the ray, this is new constructor to handle this operation
      Parameters:
      originP - the point where the movement begin
      direction - the direction of the ray which does not change in this calculation
      normal - the normal to the surface

  • Method Details

    • getStart

      public Point3D getStart()
      Returns:
      the value of the start Point

    • getDirection

      public Vector getDirection()
      Returns:
      the value of the direction vector

      Returns:

    • getT

      public double getT​(Point3D p)
      Ray = Start + t * Direction, each point on the ray has its own 't'.
      Parameters:
      p - the point it calculates on (assuming p is on the ray)
      Returns:
      t value of p

    • sortPointByT

      public void sortPointByT​(java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> points)
      Sorting by t, means sorting according to the distance between the point and the start. as the t gets bigger, the point gets further from the start.
      Parameters:
      points - List of points on the ray
